name: dcd-auth
description: An OAuth web portal to Authenticate users via the Data-Centric Design Hub

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=development LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG PORT=8888 MODEL_HOST=10.0.1.16 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 CRYPTO_KEY=cryptoKeyToChange API_URL=http://10.0.1.16:4478/api KETO_URL=http://10.0.1.16:4466 HYDRA_ADMIN_URL=http://10.0.1.16:4445 OAUTH2_TOKEN_URL=http://10.0.1.16:4444/oauth2/token OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID=dcd-auth OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET=auth-secret node index.js

author: Jacky Bourgeois
